Library Book Collections

Laut Bercerita

Author: Leila S. Chudori

A tale of struggle, sacrifice, and loss during a dark chapter in Indonesian history.

Quota: 3

The Psychology of Money

Author: Morgan Housel

Explores how a healthy mindset about money can help achieve financial freedom.

Quota: 2

The Maxwell Daily Reader

Author: John C. Maxwell

A daily guide offering leadership lessons for personal and professional development.

Quota: 2

Home Sweet Loan

Author: Almira Bastari

A humorous story about the struggles of millennials trying to achieve their dream of owning a house amidst various obstacles.

Quota: 5

The Alchemist's Secret

Author: Scott Mariani

A magical adventure in the world of alchemy filled with secrets and challenges.

Quota: 1

The Fault in Our Stars

Author: John Green

A love story that teaches courage and acceptance of life’s realities.

Quota: 1

Koala Kumal

Author: Raditya Dika

Comedy that explores everyday life with Raditya Dika's signature style.

Quota: 2

Crazy Rich Asians

Author: Kevin Kwan

A romantic comedy about cultural differences and social pressures within a wealthy Asian family.

Quota: 3

Effortless

Author: Greg McKeown

Buku pengembangan diri yang mengajarkan cara membuat hal-hal esensial dalam hidup menjadi lebih mudah dan tercapai.

Quota: 1

Supernova: Inteligensi Embun Pagi

Author: Dewi Lestari

The epic conclusion of the Supernova series, blending science, spirituality, and drama.

Quota: 2

Gojo and Geto

Author: Kimberly

Lalala

Quota: 5

Gojo and Geto

Author: Kimberly

Summary

Quota: 5
